item.title: Crocodile warnings as floods devastate southern Africa - The Guardian
item.description: Crocodile warnings as floods devastate southern Africa The GuardianMozambique floods: ‘Worst in living memory’ say those rescued from rising waters BBCFloods push crocodiles into Mozambican towns as health concerns rise PBSSADC team joins Mozambique flood rescue effort africanews.comIn Mozambique, heavy floods are turning unsafe water and malnutrition into a deadly threat for children Unicef

item.title: Ferry sinks in southern Philippines, killing at least 18 people, but over 300 rescued - CBS News
item.description: Ferry sinks in southern Philippines, killing at least 18 people, but over 300 rescued CBS NewsAt least 18 killed and hundreds rescued in Philippines ferry disaster CNNPhilippines Suspends Ferry Operator’s Fleet After Deadly Sinking Bloomberg.comDivers to be deployed in search for missing in Philippine ferry sinking ReutersAt Least 18 Dead and Hundreds Rescued After Ferry Sinks in the Philippines The New York Times

item.title: TV presenter killed in Israeli strike in southern Lebanon: Hezbollah
item.description: A Lebanese minister condemns the latest Israeli killing and calls on the international community to 'take action'.
